title.narrative: Next Steps in Developing a Commercial Fruit Sector in Tonga

description.narrative: Developing a productive national fruit sector has been a continuing priority for the government of Tonga. Two previous ACIAR projects have studied the feasibility of improving the range and quality of tropical fruits - to boost food security, improve public health and diversify Tonga’s economic development. A review of this work concluded that little progress had been made towards developing commercial production; to consolidate the gains from this initial investment, further interventions would be necessary. The purpose of this project is therefore to plan what these next steps and further investments should be. It will involve an assessment of the current status of fruit production in Tonga, leading to recommendations about opportunities for its commercial development. (PC/2012/049)
